function ajax(method, url, data, success, error) { var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open(method, url); xhr.setRequestHeader("Accept", "application/json xhr.onreadystatechange = function () { if (xhr.readyState !== XMLHttpRequest.DONE) return; if (xhr.status === 200) { success(xhr.response, xhr.responseType); } else { error(xhr.status, xhr.response, xhr.responseType, xhr.status, xhr.response, xhr.responseType, xhr.status); } }; xhr.send(data); }
